message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. Given its potential, I believe a starting price of $950,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe $700,000 would be a fair price considering my budget. I look forward to your response.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $700,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to meet you halfway â€“ how about $825,000?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am still unable to go above $750,000. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
